name: Blanket Warfare
description:
Blanket Warfare is a small couch co-op game designed to focus on fun and chaos, the first prototypes will be same keyboard but the future versions I hope will be controller based mainly! 

Prototype 0.0.2 Devlog

If you would like to support me a lil extra I have a Ko-fi!

Any and all support means the world to me and I will try my best to keep going with these projects

Also if you would like to catch me working on my games live, feel free to catch me live on my Twitch!
